external_games.name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster - Lights Out

name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster - Lights Out
summary: Get ready to dive back into the fast-paced world of Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster! This thrilling drilling game takes you on an exciting journey through unique biomes where danger lurks at every turn. In this chapter, Carton and Felicity have retrieved the Earth element, but their adventure is far from over. Now, they must brave the treacherous Lab Biome, a high-tech environment filled with perilous machines and cunning enemies determined to stop them from reaching their goal.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Adventure Kitty Drill Buster: Light's Out Launch
